about.title: About
about.content:
My name is Orion(Tunan) Chen. I am a software engineer with a passion for web development. I have experience in both frontend and backend development, and I am always eager to learn new technologies. I am currently pursuing a master's degree in software engineering at the University of St. Andrews. I am looking for opportunities to work on exciting projects and contribute to the tech community.

In my free time, I enjoy reading, hiking, and playing video games. I am also a big fan of open-source software and enjoy contributing to open-source projects. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.fullstackDesc: - Worked as a full stack developer, contributing to various web development projects.
experience.digitmasterDesc: - Worked as a frontend developer intern, developing AI chat interface using Vue.js and Unocss.
experience.telepaceDesc: - Worked as a frontend developer intern, building AI-powered survey platform using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
experience.kanjiangainianDesc: - Worked as a web full stack development intern, contributing to various web development projects.
experience.yidaDesc: - Worked as a frontend intern, gaining hands-on experience in the frontend department.

awards.title: Awards
awards.outstandingDesc: - Awarded as an outstanding student for academic excellence.
awards.scholarshipDesc: - Received a scholarship for outstanding performance in the subject competition.
